## PlatformEx.resourcePathPrefix property

The path prefix for resolving local files on this platform. This returns: - `file:///` on mobile. - `app://random-id/` on desktop (Replaces the old format of `app://local/`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
resourcePathPrefix: string;
```
